document.masterDocTitle: Four new species of Rotundabaloghia Hirschmann, 1975 from East Africa (Acari: Uropodidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Four new species of Rotundabaloghia Hirschmann, 1975 from East Africa (Acari: Uropodidae)

heading.emphasis:
Key to the East African species of
Rotundabaloghia

paragraph.keyLead:
1 . Ventral shield with strongly sclerotised transverse depression
....... R
. magnafoveolata
Hirschmann, 1992 a
- Ventral shield without strongly sclerotised transverse depression............................................................... 2

4 . Sternal setae St 2 and St 3 equal in length to St 1 (
Fig. 3
)
............................... R
. rwandae
Hirschmann, 1984

- Sternal setae St 2 and St 3 twice as long as St 1 (
Fig. 26
)
.......................................... R
. bukavuensis
sp. nov.

6 .
V 6
shorter than
V 7 and V 8
, pattern of genital shield of female maculate
.... R
. spatulata
Kontschán, 2004

- V 6 as long as
V 7 and V 8
, pattern of genital shield of female alveolar
..... R
. lupangae
Hirschmann, 1992 a

9 . Ventral shield with ornamentation near anal platelets; genital shield of female with alveolar ornamentation over whole surface
.............................................................................. R
. ukoguruensis
Hirschmann, 1992 a

- Ventral shield without ornamentation near anal platelets; central region of genital shield of female without ornamentation
............................................................................................ R
. dodomae
Hirschmann, 1992 a
10 . Sternal shield of male and genital shield of female ornamented ............................................................... 11
11 . Genital shield of female with small alveolar ornamentation ..................................................................... 12
- Genital shield of female with large alveolar ornamentation on................................................................. 14

- Genital shield of female linguliform
....................................................... R
. nguruensis
Hirschmann, 1992 a

13 . Setae
V 6
,
V 7
,
V 8
long;
V 6
long enough to reach past base of
V 8
,
V 7
projecting well beyond margin of idiosoma
........................................................................................................... R
. pocsi
Hirschmann, 1992 a

14 . Genital shield of female with small anterior process
.......................................... R
. kikuyu
Kontschán, 2004

16 . Distance between
V 6 and V 2
equal to distance between
V 6 and V 7
...... R
. heterochaeta
Kontschán, 2004

- Distance between
V 6 and V 2
shorter than distance between
V 6 and V 7
... R
. africana
Hirschmann, 1992 a

- Ventral setae
V 6 and V 7
with short pilosity (
Fig. 10
)
................................................. R
. splendida
sp. nov.

18 . Apical part of genital shield as wide as basal part
............................................ R
. feherdii
Kontschán, 2004

19 . Distance between
V 6 and V 8
equal to distance between

........................................................ 20
